name: Riptail Shark
text:
2 Level 3 Fish monsters
You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; Draw 1 card then, this card gains 500 ATK. If this card was Xyz Summoned using two "Shark" monsters as material you can detach 2 Xyz materials from this card; Draw 2 cards then, this card gains 1000 ATK. You can only use 1 effect of "Riptail Shark" per turn and only once that turn.
